title: Vesak
summary: Vesak (Pali: Vesākha, Sanskrit: Vaiśākha, සිංහල: වෙසක්), also known as Buddha Jayanti,[3] Buddha Purnima[4] and Buddha Day, is a holiday traditionally observed by Buddhists in South Asia and Southeast Asia as well as Tibet and Mongolia.[5] The festival commemorates the birth, enlightenment (Nibbāna), and death (Parinirvāna) of Gautama Buddha in Theravada, Tibetan Buddhism and Navayana.[6]
